blocks.name: csubstr
blocks.content: Syntax for the subword operator.
blocks.origin: const class csubstr { substr }

blocks.name: diff.csubstr.s
diff.csubstr.c
diff.csubstr.w
df-substr
blocks.content: Define an operation which extracts portions (called _subwords_ or _substrings_) of words. Definition in Section 9.1 of [AhoHopUll] p. 318. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: swrdnznd
blocks.content: The value of a subword operation for noninteger arguments is the empty set. (This is due to our definition of function values for out-of-domain arguments, see ~ ndmfv ). (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2022.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm swrdnznd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wceq(co(c2, csubstr, cop(c0, c1)), emptycls))
} = {
  syl(wn(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz))), wceq(co(c2, csubstr, cop(c0, c1)), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cz, cz)))))
  con3i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cz, cz))))
  adantl(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cz, cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  biimpi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cxp(cz, cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  opelxp(c0, c1, cz, cz)
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, cop(c0, c1), cxp(cz, cz), csubstr, cif(cmpt(hs2, co(nat0, cfzo, co(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cmin, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)))), cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs2), caddc, cfv(c1st, cv(hs1))))), emptycls, wss(co(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfzo, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  df-substr(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cz, cz))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cxp(cz, cz))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}

  df-substr(hs0, hs1, hs2)

blocks.name: swrdval
blocks.content: Value of a subword. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)

} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)‚Üí(c0[substr]< c2, c3 >)= if((c2[..^]c3)‚äÜ dom(c0),(s0 ‚àà(0[..^](c3[-]c2))‚Ü¶(c0 `(s0[+]c2))), ‚àÖ)), d(s0, c1))

  simprl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), hs0 = c0, hs1 = < c2, c3 >)
  sylan9eqr((1st ` hs1), c2, (1st ` < c2, c3 >), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = < c2, c3 >))
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = < c2, c3 >, (1st ` hs1)=(1st ` < c2, c3 >))

  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (1st ` < c2, c3 >)= c2)
  op1stg(c2, cz, c3, cz)
  sylan9eqr((2nd ` hs1), c3, (2nd ` < c2, c3 >), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = < c2, c3 >))
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = < c2, c3 >, (2nd ` hs1)=(2nd ` < c2, c3 >))
  fveq2(hs1, < c2, c3 >, c2nd)
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, (2nd ` < c2, c3 >)= c3)

  fveq12d(hs0, (s0[+](1st ` hs1)), c0, (s0[+]c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß(1st ` hs1)= c2 ‚àß(2nd ` hs1)= c3))

  simp2(hs0 = c0, (1st ` hs1)= c2, (2nd ` hs1)= c3)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, < c2, c3 > ‚àà(‚Ñ§ √ó ‚Ñ§))

blocks.content: The value of a subword operation for inproper arguments is the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2022.)

blocks.name: swrd0
blocks.content: A subword of an empty set is always the empty set. (Contributed by AV, 31-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 20-Oct-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 2-May-2020.)

  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c2))), wbr(c3, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), w3a(wcel(c2, cn0), wcel(c3, cn0), wbr(c2, cle, c3)))

blocks.name: swrdspsleq
blocks.content: Two words have a common subword (starting at the same position with the same length) iff they have the same symbols at each position. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Aug-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 7-May-2020.)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

} = {
  pm2.61ian(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c2)))), wb(wceq(co(c0, csubstr, cop(c3, c4)), co(c2, csubstr, cop(c3, c4))), wral(s0, co(c3, cfzo, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))), wbr(c4, cle, c3))

  simpr2(wbr(c4, cle, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c2))))

  3ad2ant2(wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(c2, cword(c1))), wa(wcel(c3, cn0), wcel(c4, cn0)), wa(wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c0)), wbr(c4, cle, cfv(chash, c2))), wi(wbr(c4, cle, c3), wral(s0, co(c3, cfzo, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))))

thm disjxwrdOLD(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wdisj(s0, c0, crab(s1, cword(c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  invdisjrab(s0, s1, c0, cword(c1), co(cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), csubstr, cop(nat0, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csubstr.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, nat0, c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cword.s(s1, c1)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {

}
